languages.text: Группа злостных пиратов не первое столетие безнаказанно грабит грузовые суда по всему Простору — даже славной Теодоре фон Валанциус не удалось призвать мерзавцев к ответу, ибо те успешно избегали смертоносной встречи. Однако Вольному Торговцу представился шанс положить конец безнаказанному разбою: корабли назойливой шайки были замечены в системе Пояс Лангренна во главе с флагманским судном "Неуловимое презрение".

A band of vicious pirates have been plundering cargo ships throughout the Expanse with impunity for centuries. Not even the illustrious Theodora von Valancius was able to bring the scoundrels to justice, for they successfully avoided a deadly encounter with her. However, the Rogue Trader now has a chance to put an end to their brigandage: the ships of the troublesome gang have been spotted in Langrenn's Belt, led by their flagship — the Elusive Contempt.
languages.original_text: Группа злостных пиратов не первое столетие безнаказанно грабит грузовые суда по всему Простору — даже славной Теодоре фон Валанциус не удалось призвать мерзавцев к ответу, ибо те успешно избегали смертоносной встречи. Однако Вольному Торговцу представился шанс положить конец безнаказанному разбою: корабли назойливой шайки были замечены в системе Пояс Лангренна во главе с флагманским судном "Неуловимое презрение".

languages.text: 几百年来，一群邪恶的海盗始终在科罗努斯扩区大肆劫掠，没有受到过任何惩罚。就连王朝的杰出领袖西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯，都没能将这些恶棍绳之以法，因为那群海盗始终躲避着西奥多拉的视线。然而现在，行商浪人终于有机会彻底消灭他们了。有人在朗恩之带目击到了这支海盗舰队，领头的旗舰叫做“诡秘蔑视号”。
languages.original_text: A band of vicious pirates have been plundering cargo ships throughout the Expanse with impunity for centuries. Not even the illustrious Theodora von Valancius was able to bring the scoundrels to justice, for they successfully avoided a deadly encounter with her. However, the Rogue Trader now has a chance to put an end to their brigandage: the ships of the troublesome gang have been spotted in Langrenn's Belt, led by their flagship — the Elusive Contempt.

traits.locale_text: 几百年来，一群邪恶的海盗始终在科罗努斯扩区大肆劫掠，没有受到过任何惩罚。就连王朝的杰出领袖西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯，都没能将这些恶棍绳之以法，因为那群海盗始终躲避着西奥多拉的视线。然而现在，行商浪人终于有机会彻底消灭他们了。有人在朗恩之带目击到了这支海盗舰队，领头的旗舰叫做“诡秘蔑视号”。

languages.text: Depuis des siècles, une bande de redoutables pirates s'en prend aux vaisseaux de marchandises des Étendues en toute impunité. Même l'illustre Théodora von Valancius n'est jamais parvenue à les traîner devant la justice, car ils ont toujours réussi à lui échapper. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a aujourd'hui une chance de mettre enfin un terme à leurs exactions : les vaisseaux des pirates, menés par nul autre que leur vaisseau amiral l'Insaisissable Avanie, ont été repérés dans la Ceinture de Langrenn.
languages.original_text: A band of vicious pirates have been plundering cargo ships throughout the Expanse with impunity for centuries. Not even the illustrious Theodora von Valancius was able to bring the scoundrels to justice, for they successfully avoided a deadly encounter with her. However, the Rogue Trader now has a chance to put an end to their brigandage: the ships of the troublesome gang have been spotted in Langrenn's Belt, led by their flagship — the Elusive Contempt.

languages.text: Una banda de piratas sanguinarios lleva siglos saqueando cargueros en la Extensión impunemente. Ni siquiera la ilustre Theodora von Valancius pudo traer a estos rufianes ante la justicia, ya que lograron darle esquinazo una y otra vez. Sin embargo, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente está en posición de poner fin a sus fechorías: se han avistado las naves de la banda en el Cinturón de Langrenn, lideradas por su nave insignia, el Odio Escurridizo.
languages.original_text: A band of vicious pirates have been plundering cargo ships throughout the Expanse with impunity for centuries. Not even the illustrious Theodora von Valancius was able to bring the scoundrels to justice, for they successfully avoided a deadly encounter with her. However, the Rogue Trader now has a chance to put an end to their brigandage: the ships of the troublesome gang have been spotted in Langrenn's Belt, led by their flagship — the Elusive Contempt.

traits.locale_text: Una banda de piratas sanguinarios lleva siglos saqueando cargueros en la Extensión impunemente. Ni siquiera la ilustre Theodora von Valancius pudo traer a estos rufianes ante la justicia, ya que lograron darle esquinazo una y otra vez. Sin embargo, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente está en posición de poner fin a sus fechorías: se han avistado las naves de la banda en el Cinturón de Langrenn, lideradas por su nave insignia, el Odio Escurridizo.

languages.text: 危険な海賊の一団は何世紀にもわたり、裁かれることなくエクスパンス中の貨物船を略奪して回っている。高名なかのシオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスでさえ、巧妙に彼女との遭遇を避ける密輸業者たちに裁きを下すことはできなかった。しかし、自由開拓者は今や彼らの略奪行為に終止符を打つチャンスを得た。旗艦エルーシブ・コンテンプト号率いるやっかいな海賊の船団が、ラングレンズベルトで発見されたのだ。
languages.original_text: A band of vicious pirates have been plundering cargo ships throughout the Expanse with impunity for centuries. Not even the illustrious Theodora von Valancius was able to bring the scoundrels to justice, for they successfully avoided a deadly encounter with her. However, the Rogue Trader now has a chance to put an end to their brigandage: the ships of the troublesome gang have been spotted in Langrenn's Belt, led by their flagship — the Elusive Contempt.

traits.locale_text: 危険な海賊の一団は何世紀にもわたり、裁かれることなくエクスパンス中の貨物船を略奪して回っている。高名なかのシオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスでさえ、巧妙に彼女との遭遇を避ける密輸業者たちに裁きを下すことはできなかった。しかし、自由開拓者は今や彼らの略奪行為に終止符を打つチャンスを得た。旗艦エルーシブ・コンテンプト号率いるやっかいな海賊の船団が、ラングレンズベルトで発見されたのだ。

languages.text: Eine Bande brutaler Piraten plündert seit Jahrhunderten in der gesamten Ausdehnung ungestraft Frachtschiffe. Nicht einmal der illustren Theodora von Valancius war es gelungen, die Schurken zur Strecke zu bringen, denn es gelang ihnen, eine tödliche Begegnung mit ihr zu vermeiden. Doch {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} hat nun die Gelegenheit, ihrem Treiben ein Ende zu bereiten: Die Schiffe der lästigen Bande wurden in Langrenns Gürtel gesichtet, angeführt von ihrem Flaggschiff — der Flüchtigen Verachtung.
languages.original_text: A band of vicious pirates have been plundering cargo ships throughout the Expanse with impunity for centuries. Not even the illustrious Theodora von Valancius was able to bring the scoundrels to justice, for they successfully avoided a deadly encounter with her. languages.text: Tehlikeli bir grup korsan, yüzyıllardır Enginlik'teki gemileri yağmalamakta ve herhangi bir misillemeyle karşılaşmamakta. Çok değerli Theodora von Valancius bile bu haydutları adaletin karşısına çıkarmayı başaramadı. Bu haydutlar onunla ölümcül bir karşılaşmaya girmekten kaçınmayı sürekli olarak başardı. Ancak Hür Tacir'in artık bu eşkıyalığa bir son verme şansı var: Baş belası çetenin gemileri, Langrenn Kuşağı'nda görüldü. Gruba, Kaçkın Kibir adındaki sancak gemisi önderlik ediyor.
languages.original_text: A band of vicious pirates have been plundering cargo ships throughout the Expanse with impunity for centuries. Not even the illustrious Theodora von Valancius was able to bring the scoundrels to justice, for they successfully avoided a deadly encounter with her. However, the Rogue Trader now has a chance to put an end to their brigandage: the ships of the troublesome gang have been spotted in Langrenn's Belt, led by their flagship — the Elusive Contempt.
